data.name: 晝想夜夢 Demo
data.detailed_description:
◆Story


I, Li Zhiyuan, was an ordinary university student.
Although I was just living an ordinary life, I was quite content with a stable daily routine.
... But…if that was true, what about the strange feelings that came up from time to time?

The mysterious man who suddenly appeared claimed to be an icubus and seemed to have a strange obsession with me.
Could I really believe what he said? And why was he so insistent?
What was even stranger was that this strange man had always seemed familiar to me for no apparent reason…

◆Game Features


　◇An R-18 BL adventure visual novel featuring an incubus and a university student.
　◇The main character will go to a different future with the choices you make
　◇Travel through the world of dreams, find your memories and face your heart
　◇A 50,000-word story with 6 CGs and 2 main endings to explore
　◇Full CG mode can be turned on for free browsing of HCGs
　◇Stress-free operation, enjoy the bitter-sweet love story with ease

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
